Microsoft | Product Marketing Manager | Seattle | ONSITE https://aka.ms/m0f72a

Our team of open source change agents in Azure is growing! We thrive when organizations of all types transform what they do with open source in the cloud, whether Linux, Node.js, Docker, Java or other open source technologies.

If you're looking to do something different where you can still bring deep subject matter expertise in the open source space, don't hesitate to get in touch.

I am not the hiring manager but I'm part of the team and have done open source here for 7 years (one of the few Debian Developers around, if you share our love for debian/rules)

Drop us an e-mail: opensource@microsoft.com
